TopicTitle: Stupid questions because I can't find the stupid answers.

Articles.Content:
I'm playing 1.1, but now when I go to launch, my ship has no crew portraits, but shows the cutaway view, instead. There are crew inside, but they don't show in the cutaway. I can't figure out how to shut off the cutaway view and restore the crew portraits. I also can't seem to find the in-game manual. Don't snark, please. I have enough problems without your derision.

And many thanks to those who have the patience to help me with this.

ETA: I found the manual. I remembered what to look for. I'll see if this will help me correct the other problem.

ETA More: Well, it isn't simple. Apparently that cutaway was also the crew. I clicked on the hatch and had Valentina exit the capsule. When she did, I looked, and saw that the cutaway was the crew. Still no sign of the crew portraits. Back in a few with pics.

Edited April 23, 2016 by SSgt Baloo

I finally found Valentina. Apparently she died and is now haunting the ship's interior. You can see her here:

It was a bit of a surprise, this was the first time I had someone exit the cockpit since I noticed this problem.
 

More images here: http://s28.photobucket.com/user/SSgtBaloo/slideshow/Modded%20KSP%201point1%20problem

What information do I need to share, and with whom?

Edited April 23, 2016 by SSgt Baloo
The problem vanished once I deleted Raster Prop Monitor. Something else, I presume, wasn't playing nice with it, but my troubleshooting skills are a bit limited. *Shrug*
